item.title: 韦斯顾问寻求对 3000 万美元奖金支付进行外部审查
item.description: 负责关闭 Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC 的顾问们希望对近 3,000 万美元的员工奖金进行独立审查，这些奖金与对冲基金的主要债权人杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）存在法律纠纷。【原文：Advisers tasked with shutting-down Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC want an independent review of nearly $30 million in employee bonuses that are subject to a legal dispute with the hedge fund’s primary creditor, Jefferies Financial Group.】

item.title: 各州以大衰退以来最快速度削减开支
item.description: 美国各州预计将削减预算，这标志着经过多年刺激经济增长和减税政策的推动，各州的支出将恢复到较为适度的水平。【原文：US states are expected to cut their budgets, marking a return to more modest levels of spending after years of stimulus-fueled growth and tax cuts.】

item.title: 凯科称，ETF 首发后以太币表现将优于比特币
item.description: 研究公司Kaiko表示，即将推出的以太币现货交易基金可能会推动这种加密货币的表现继续超越更大的竞争对手比特币。【原文：The upcoming launch of spot Ether exchange-traded funds may propel the cryptocurrency to keep outperforming bigger rival Bitcoin, research firm Kaiko said.】

item.title: 高盛发表观点后，交易员增加对美联储降息的押注
item.description: 在高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）表示宽松条件已经成熟后，交易员们加大了对美联储今年将降息三次的押注。【原文：Traders added to bets the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates three times this year after Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said conditions were ripe for easing.】

item.title: 交易员抛弃墨西哥比索，因为袭击事件提升了特朗普的竞选支持率
item.description: 墨西哥比索在外汇市场的大跌中首当其冲，因为在本周末发生暗杀未遂事件后，资金经理们加大了对唐纳德-特朗普将确保在白宫连任的押注。【原文：The Mexican peso is bearing the brunt of the selloff in foreign-exchange markets as money managers ramp up bets Donald Trump will secure a second term in the White House after the assassination attempt this weekend.】

item.title: 欧盟主席真蒂洛尼表示：欧元区经济有望加速增长
item.description: 欧洲经济专员保罗-真蒂洛尼（Paolo Gentiloni）周一表示，欧元区经济正在逐步回暖，经济活动有望在今年剩余时间内加速增长。【原文：The euro-area economy is gradually picking up and activity is on track to accelerate over the remainder of the year, European Economy Commissioner Paolo Gentiloni said on Monday.】

item.title: 自由港液化天然气计划在飓风破坏后分阶段重新启动
item.description: 总部位于得克萨斯州的自由港液化天然气公司正在分阶段重启其出口设施，此前飓风破坏了该厂的部分设施。【原文：Texas-based Freeport LNG is restarting its export facility on a phased basis following a hurricane that damaged part of the plant.】

item.title: 受股票推动，Calpers 在 2024 财年实现 9.3% 的收益
item.description: 加州公务员退休系统（California Public Employees' Retirement System）报告称，其最近一个财政年度的收益率为 9.3%，收益主要来自于公共股权投资和私人债务。【原文：The California Public Employees’ Retirement System reported a 9.3% gain for its latest fiscal year, with returns driven largely by public equity investments and private debt.】

item.title: 杰富瑞聘请巴克莱资深银行家勒帕鲁德
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. has hired Thierry Le Palud, global chairman of industrials in investment banking at Barclays Plc, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 期权交易员押注特朗普媒体股将进一步反弹
item.description: 交易商正在买入期权，押注唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体公司还有进一步上涨的空间。【原文：Traders are buying options betting that Donald Trump’s media company — which soared as much as 50% early Monday — has further room to gain.】

item.title: 特朗普上台威胁州和地方政府减税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）竞选连任总统的势头重新点燃了人们的担忧，人们担心长期以来梦寐以求的市政债券减税政策可能会被取消，以帮助支付永久性减税。【原文：The momentum behind Donald Trump’s campaign for a second term as president is rekindling concerns that the long-cherished municipal bond tax-break may be scrapped to help pay for permanent tax cuts.】

item.title: 斯蒂芬-罗奇警告美国对华政策可能带来灾难性后果
item.description:

item.title: 卷入欺诈诉讼的前杰富瑞斯基金经理履新数周即辞职
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）对冲基金的前投资组合经理乔丹-奇里科（Jordan Chirico）在上任约两周后离开了连锁餐厅 FAT Brands Inc.【原文：Jordan Chirico, a former portfolio manager at a Jefferies Financial Group hedge fund, has left restaurant chain FAT Brands Inc. after about two weeks on the job as he faces fraud allegations tied to his previous role.】

item.title: Corus 在痛失华纳电视转播权后对未来发出警告
item.description: Corus Entertainment 公司表示，由于广告收入持续下滑，该公司可能很快就会违反债务契约，并计划进一步重组。【原文：Corus Entertainment Inc. said it may soon breach its debt covenants and that it’s planning further restructuring as advertising revenue continues to tumble.】

item.title: 希腊延长海军演习以阻止俄罗斯石油输送
item.description: 希腊再次延长了海军演习的时间，这些演习在很大程度上阻止了俄罗斯石油在希腊海岸线附近的转运，迫使石油转运到世界其他枢纽。【原文：Greece is again extending the naval drills that have largely deterred transfers of Russian oil near its coastline and forced them to other hubs across the world.】

item.title: 美国对荷中关系的压力波及 ASML 资助的大学
item.description: 随着华盛顿试图限制北京生产半导体的能力，作为 ASML Holding NV 人才输送基地的一所荷兰顶尖技术大学陷入了中美芯片战的漩涡。【原文：A top Dutch technical university that is a key feeder for ASML Holding NV talent has been caught in the crosshairs of the US-China chip war as Washington seeks to limit Beijing’s ability to produce semiconductors.】

item.title: Arbor Realty 重申遵守财务和信息披露规定
item.description: Arbor Realty Trust Inc. 周一发表声明称，其财务和商业行为符合会计和监管义务。【原文：Arbor Realty Trust Inc. said its financials and business practices are in compliance with accounting and regulatory obligations, according to a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 欧元区财政首脑承诺削减开支以减少债务
item.description: 多年来，欧元区各国政府为支持企业和家庭渡过科维德疫情和能源危机而增加了支出，但明年各国政府承诺减少支出，以降低借贷。【原文：Euro-zone governments committed to reducing expenditure next year to bring down borrowing after years of higher spending to support businesses and households through the Covid pandemic and energy crisis.】

item.title: CoinShares 称比特币投资产品连续第三周出现资金流入
item.description: 根据CoinShares Ltd.的数据，比特币投资产品上周吸金13.5亿美元，这是连续第三周流入，也是自6月初以来的最高值。【原文：Bitcoin investment products took in $1.35 billion last week, marking the third straight week of inflows and the highest amount since the start of June, according to CoinShares Ltd. data.】

item.title: 私募股权投资回报疲软令顶尖大学流动性承压
item.description: 长期以来，美国名牌大学一直是私募股权投资的开拓者，为这一资产类别投入了数十亿美元。【原文：Elite US universities have long been private equity trailblazers, plowing billions of dollars into the asset class.】

item.title: 欧洲负盈利潮有望在下半年出现转机
item.description: 迄今为止，欧洲的财报季给投资者带来了一些暗淡的迹象，但人们乐观地认为，该地区今年晚些时候会出现转机。【原文：Europe’s earnings season has so far offered investors some bleak signs, but there is optimism that the region can turn a corner later this year.】

item.title: 英国斯坦洛炼油厂计划在竞争对手关闭后出售更多燃料
item.description: 英格兰北部的斯坦洛炼油厂正准备在明年苏格兰的一家竞争对手工厂关闭后出售更多燃料。【原文：The Stanlow oil refinery in northern England is getting ready to sell more fuel when a rival plant in Scotland shutters next year.】

item.title: 匈牙利央行因 CPI 下滑而进一步降息
item.description: 匈牙利央行表示，计划在今年剩余时间内降低关键利率多达三次，在通胀数据走软之后，本月已在考虑降低利率。【原文：Hungary’s central bank signaled it plans to reduce its key rate on as many as three occasions in the remainder of the year, with a cut already this month under consideration following softer inflation data.】

item.title: 董事会终止收购谈判后梅西百货债券下滑
item.description: 梅西百货公司（Macy's Inc.【原文：Macy’s Inc. bonds fell early Monday after the company said that it is ending discussions with Arkhouse Management Co. and Brigade Capital Management on a potential buyout of the department store chain.】

item.title: 针对低评级 CLO 的 ETF 首次突破 10 亿美元
item.description: 一家购买较低评级抵押贷款债务风险敞口的交易所交易基金的资产规模已突破 10 亿美元，这是 CLO 基金在这个曾经只对机构投资者开放的市场上快速发展的又一个里程碑。【原文：An exchange traded fund that buys exposure to lower-rated collateralized loan obligations has surpassed $1 billion of assets, another milestone for fast-growing CLO funds in a market once open only to institutional investors.】

item.title: 无论谁当总统，税收都会增加，这将使小额债券具有吸引力
item.description: MacKay Shields LLC 指出，无论谁在 11 月的美国总统大选中获胜，美国人明年都将缴纳更高的税款。这使得市政债券成为一种有吸引力的挡箭牌。【原文：No matter who wins November’s US presidential election, Americans will be paying higher taxes next year, according to MacKay Shields LLC. That makes muni bonds an attractive shield.】

item.title: KKR支持的OneStream公司股东在美国IPO中寻求4.66亿美元融资
item.description: OneStream Inc. 和包括 KKR & Co. 在内的一批股东正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集 4.655 亿美元。【原文：OneStream Inc. and a group of shareholders including KKR & Co. are seeking to raise $465.5 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 三井住友聘请法国兴业银行银行家担任沙特阿拉伯高级职务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，日本三井住友银行从法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）聘请了 Abdul Haleem Al Balooshi 领导该行在沙特阿拉伯的业务。【原文：Japan’s Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. hired Abdul Haleem Al Balooshi from Societe Generale SA to lead the bank’s coverage in Saudi Arabia, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国家石油公司反驳丹格特关于炼油厂股份的说法
item.description: 尼日利亚国有石油公司反驳了非洲首富的说法，即该公司未能履行付款义务，将其在尼日利亚大型炼油厂的股份从 7.2% 增加到 20%。【原文：Nigeria’s state-owned oil company rebutted claims by Africa’s richest man that it failed to meet its payment obligations to increase its stake in his mega refinery to 20% from 7.2%.】

item.title: 股价下跌 65% 后，Ocado 的长期牛股放弃了交易
item.description: 一位为奥卡多集团（Ocado Group Plc）工作了两年多的分析师改变了对该公司股票的看法，称鉴于项目延迟和流动性挑战，这家在线食品杂货公司需要 "认真考虑自己的选择"。【原文：An analyst who rooted for Ocado Group Plc for more than two years has reversed his call on the stock, saying the online grocery firm needs to “seriously consider its options” given project delays and liquidity challenges.】
